properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REPORT WHERE REPORT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO, M1.USER_ID AS ID1, M2.USER_ID AS ID2, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_TYPE FROM TB_REPORT R JOIN TB_MEMBER M1 ON (R.USER_NO = M1.USER_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER M2 ON (R.USER_NO2 = M2.USER_NO) ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_TYPE , USER_NO , USER_NO2 FROM TB_REPORT R FULL OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE R.REPORT_STATUS = 'Y' AND REPORT_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_REPORT SET REPORT_STATUS = 'N' , REPORT_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
